name: The Four Door Brooklyn Sideboard
description: This large four door Brooklyn cabinet is sleek and elegant with a glamorous handle and extraordinary finishing that makes a bold statement. The cabinet is shown with a stunning radial pattern hand laid by Davidson's highly skilled and talented team of craftsmen down at their British workshop. The four door Brooklyn sideboard is available in any of Davidson's lustrous timber finishes or lacquers with high gloss or satin options to choose from. It opens to reveal an interior in satin timber with adjustable shelves offering luxury storage that will sit beautifully in any smart residence, hotel or yacht.
